TriggerText.Text: An experienced inn keeper offers his services if you will buy his inn.
An industrious builder offers to use some of his spare supplies to build you a surprise building if you will cover some expenses.

WorldNewsTexts.Text: Sailors around the world tell stories of creatures from the deep becoming more aggresive and common!
